HDG.IM.content: Nietzsche dismissive, “Being” is a deception that shouldn’t have happened [that’s a rather dismissive view of Nietzsche’s subtlety] > [regardless of answer to Nietzsche, Heidegger will not relinquish strategy of “aura” of question] [moral image of thought]
